mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "initiative" (id, description, area, num_votos,creation_date,User_id,modify_date,type_status_id) VALUES((select count(*)+1 from "initiative"),#{description},#{area},#{nvotos},#{creation},#{idus},#{modification},#{state})
mapper.select: SELECT i.id, i.description, i.area, i.creation_date, i.modify_date, i.user_id, ts.status as status, i.num_votos, kw.word FROM Initiative as i, Key_words as kw, word_initiative as wi, type_status as ts WHERE kw.word= #{keyword} and kw.id=wi.Key_words_id and wi.Initiative_id=i.id and ts.status = i.type_status_id;

SELECT i.id, i.description, i.area, i.creation_date, i.modify_date, i.user_id, ts.status as status, i.num_votos, kw.word FROM Initiative as i, Key_words as kw, word_initiative as wi, type_status as ts where kw.id=wi.Key_words_id and i.id=#{id} and ts.status = i.type_status_id;

SELECT i.id, i.description, i.area, i.creation_date, i.modify_date, i.user_id, ts.status as status, i.num_votos, kw.word FROM Initiative as i, Key_words as kw, word_initiative as wi, type_status as ts WHERE kw.id=wi.Key_words_id and wi.Initiative_id=i.id and ts.status = i.type_status_id;
mapper.update: update initiative set type_status_id= #{newStatus} where id= #{id};
